about_the_game:
This Sky Palace tileset adds heavenly spaces to your game! Highly detailed and crafted with both gold and silver versions, these tiles can create intricate and unique spaces for your angels and other winged folk to roam.

The Sky Palace Tileset Includes:

Ground tiles:

Grass, water and more environmental tiles
Tile floors in plain and fancy versions - gold, silver and black
Marble floor - gold, silver and black, with optional gold edge
Gold and silver fences and tables

Wall tiles:

Plain, marble and brick walls in gold, silver, medium gray and black
Bookcases, empty and filled, in gold and silver

Also includes:

Stairs to match floors
Pillars and columns
Fancy statues
Wall/floor edging
Grand staircase
Chandeliers
Fancy furniture in gold and silver – beds, chairs, armoire, mirrors, clocks, lamps, candlesticks, bathroom fixtures and more
Prison with door and lever animations
Foliage in both bright colors and gold/silver
Over 30 sky parallaxes - various times of day, cloud conditions, and night sky in many colors!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
